attributes.action: Make the Royal family pay for their own repairs.
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is started so the government MUST take note of it. The petition at https://you.38degrees.org.uk/petitions/make-royals-pay-for-palace-renovation already has 121,000 signatures but the government will simply ignore that, so I have started this petition.

Please sign and share it!!!
attributes.background: Taxpayers are expected to pay for repairs to Buckingham palace whilst thousands are impoverished by an uncaring government, food-bank use is sky high, benefits are continually eroded and the rich continue to legally avoid tax. We should not be made to pay for the luxuries of the privileged.
